body: Very peculiar work indeed, but it is unfortunate that all of this is a long gone era, touhou and scale modelling have become pretty niche things over the years. Still, it's very pleasant looking at them combined.

This feels like a time machine. Back in the days than touhou was the number one, after it came the kancoll hype and after that the fate grande order hype. Wondering what the next really big thing might be?
